title: Benchmark common operations
close_reason: Created comprehensive Criterion-based benchmark suite with 7 benchmark groups covering filtering (by status, multiple criteria), searching (case-sensitive and case-insensitive), sorting (by priority, title, updated), JSON parsing (10-500 issues), and navigation. Benchmarks test across multiple dataset sizes (10-1000 issues). All 40 benchmark tests pass. Documentation added in benches/README.md. Results viewable in target/criterion/.

title: Benchmark search performance on large datasets
close_reason:
Implemented comprehensive search performance benchmarks

Created benches/search_performance.rs with 8 benchmark suites covering:
- Substring search across all fields (100-5000 issues)
- Fuzzy matching with typo tolerance (100-5000 issues) 
- Regex pattern matching (100-5000 issues)
- Query caching optimization testing
- Combined search + filter operations
- Case-insensitive search
- Large dataset stress tests (5000-10000 issues)
- Search scope comparison (Title, Description, All)

Added benchmark configuration to Cargo.toml and updated benches/README.md with documentation.

Benchmark results show:
- Substring search: ~18ms for 5000 issues (excellent)
- Fuzzy search: ~60ms for 5000 issues (acceptable)
- Regex search: 23+ seconds for 5000 issues (identified performance issue for future optimization)

All 40 tests pass. Benchmarks compile and run successfully.
